Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Aerotaur/Terrataur::
       Aerotaur slowly picks himself up.  "I'm not hurt too badly.  The 
explosion was weaker than I expected..."  He sees the hole where the 
explosion was.  "Uh oh.  That can't be good."

       Terrataur broke through the tunnel wall into Grounded's tunnel quite 
unexpectedly.  She started to fall but caught herself on one of the walls.  
She climbed down to the bottom and found Grounded's injured body.  She opens 
another com.  "Umm...  Anyone up there that's listening.  There's a wounded 
bot down in the tunnel under the site of the explosion.  I'll try to bring 
him up."  She reached down to wrap her arms under Grounded's arms to pull him 
up the tunnel.

--part1_10c.41c6a61.28b071c3_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
